verses.1: Upna neu mite pawlbawl unla, na ngaihsutna uh a kituah kei leh zong mawhsak kei un.
verses.2: Mi pawl khat in na khempeuh ka nek theih ding hi, ci-in ngaihsun uh hi; ahi zongin upna neute in anteh bek ne ngam uh hi.
verses.3: Tua ahih manin a ne mite in a tang mite simmawh bawl kei henla, a tang mite in zong a ne mite simmawh bawl kei hen. Bang hang hiam cih leh a ne mite zong Pasian in a san mite mah ahi hi.
verses.4: Mi khatʼ nasemte tungah kua in thu khen thei ding na hi uh hiam? A gina le a gina lo a khen ding pa pen amauʼ Topa ahi hi. A Topa un hoih hi, a cih leh a kipsak zawh nading vangliatna nei ahih manin a kip hi lel ding uh hi.
verses.5: Mi pawl khatte in ni khatpeuh a dang sangin thupi zaw hi, ci-in ngaihsun uh a, pawl khatte in ni khempeuh kibang kim hi, ci-in ngaihsun uh hi. Tua ahih manin a kuamah peuh in amauʼ hoihsakna thu ciantakin thei ta uh hen.
verses.6: Ni khatpeuh thupi diak hi, ci-in a tang mite in Topa a pahtawina-in a tang ahi uh hi. An khempeuh a ne mi in zong Pasianʼ tungah lungdamna ko-in ne uh ahih manin Topa a pahtawina mahin a ne uh ahi hi. Nek dingin kilawm lo hi, ci-in a ne lo mite in zong Pasian tungah lungdamna mah ko ahih manin Topa a pahtawina mahin a ne lo uh ahi hi.
verses.7: Ama ading bekin kuamah nungta lo a, ama ading bekin kuamah si lo hi.
verses.8: I nuntak leh Topa adingin a nungta ihi a, i sih leh zong Topa ading mahin a si ihi hi. Tua ahih manin i si a, i hing zongin Topa aʼ ihi hi.
verses.9: Hih thu hangin Khris pen a site le a hingteʼ Topa ahih theih nadingin hong si-in hong nungtakik hi.
verses.10: Tua ahihleh bang hangin na Khristian pihte uh tungah thu khen a, bang hangin simmawh bawl thei na hi uh hiam? Thukhenna a thuak dingin Pasianʼ mai ah eite khempeuh a ding ciat ding ihi hi.
verses.11: Lai Siangtho sungah, “Kei pen a nungta ka hih mah bangin ka mai ah mi khempeuh hong kun dinga, Pasian ka hihna thu mi khempeuh in pulak taktak ding uh hi, Topa in ci hi,” ci-in a kigelh hi.
verses.12: Tua ahih manin a kuamah peuh in i gamtatna ciat Pasianʼ mai ah a va kigen tel ciat ding ihi hi.
verses.13: Tua ahih manin khatlekhat kimawhsakin thu kikhen kei unla, i Khristian pihte i puksak khak loh nading, a dongtangsak ihih khak loh nadingin ngaihsun ciat ni.
verses.14: Topa Jesu tawh kipawlin a lungsim ka theihna tawh, na khat peuhpeuh ama thu-in a dawizek om het lo hi, ci-in teltakin ka thei hi. Ahi zongin mi khatpeuh in dawizek hi, ci-in a ngaihsut leh ama adingin a dawizek hi pah hi.
verses.15: An khatpeuh na nekna uh hangin na Khristian pihteʼ lungnopmawhna na piansak uh leh itna lungsim tawh a gamta na hi nawn kei uh hi. Na annekna uh tawh, Khris in a sih lawh miteʼ siat nading piangsak kei un.
verses.16: Tua ciangin note in hoih na sak uh thute, midangte in a sia-in a gen khak loh theih nadingun na gamta un.
verses.17: Bang hang hiam cih leh Pasianʼ Ukna pen nekledawn tawh a kisai thu hi lo a, Kha Siangtho hangin i ngah Pasianʼ deih bangin gamtatna, kilemna, lungdamna, cihte hizaw hi.
verses.18: Hih bang danin Khrisʼ na a sem mite in Pasian lungdamsak a, mite zong a lungkimsak uh hi.
verses.19: Tua ahih ciangin mi tawh kilem theih nading le kha thu ah khatlekhat thahatna i kipiak theih nading thute hanciam ciat ni.
verses.20: Annek huhau-in Pasianʼ sep sa thute susia kei ni. An khempeuh a kine thei ding ahi hi; ahi zongin tua nekna hangin mi khat peuhpeuh a puk ding ahihleh a khial ihi hi.
verses.21: Midangte in a puk lawh theih annekna, zunekna le na khat peuhpeuh i kikep ding a man pen ahi hi.
verses.22: Hih thu ah noʼ upna le noʼ ngaihsutnate, Pasian tawh noteʼ kikal thu hisak un. Amau lungsim sungah man a sak bangun a gamta zote pen a lung uh nuam mahmah hi.
verses.23: Ahi zongin lunghimawh pipi-in a ne a om leh, a upna uh tawh kizui-in a gamta hi lo uh ahih manin Pasian in tua bang mite a mawhsak ding hi. I upna bangin gamtat lohna peuhpeuh mawhna ahi hi.
